title: Garrys.Mod.v13.09.12-v13.12.06.Update
description:
===========================================
Instructions
===========================================

1. Extract all the contents from the rar file to your Garry's Mod folder and overwrite when asked

2. Launch the game as usual

===========================================
Changelog v13.12.06
===========================================

Unknown, but likely small fixes

===========================================
Changelog v13.12.05
===========================================

FIX  Fixed Lua exploits
FIX  Fixed broken startup under OSX Mavericks
ADD Added ability to modify pdata of offline players
ADD Added map categories
FIX Fixed mp_falldamage
FIX Adjusted NPC default weapons
FIX Improved Fist hit detection 
FIX Fixed Delay not updating on Dynamite tool
FIX Fixed Keys not updating on Dynamite, Emitter, Hoverball, Lamp, Light and Thruster
FIX Fixed slider tool bugs
FIX TTT: fix thrown knife sometimes dealing double damage
FIX Fixed texture for TextBox_Disabled
FIX Fixed GM:GetVehicles()
FIX Added blur recomputation to Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur
FIX Fixed button Toggle State updating improperly
FIX Fixed Ã¢â‚¬Å“Remove on ExplodeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ not updating on dynamite
FIX Fixed No Collide undo & remove all constraints
FIX Changed all default keys to their Numpad counterparts
FIX TTT: remove old resources.lua (clients already have all resources)
FIX  Reduced gap between entities in Axis, Motor, Wheel, Emitter & Weld Easy tools
FIX Added ghosting for Hoverball, Emitter, Light & Lamp tools
FIX Removed useless code parts/Improved code formatting
FIX Improved positioning for Lamp & Light tools
FIX Fixed Glow for Button & Light
FIX Removed glow sprite for Light when light is off
FIX Animations made faster for Button,
FIX Award vehicle run-over kills to the driver
FIX TTT: Clean up C4 timer positioning

===========================================
